mapper.select: SELECT f.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.role, u.work_location, f.value, sq.survey_id, q.question, o.risk, o.checked FROM covid.feedback f JOIN covid.USER u ON u.user_id = f.user_id JOIN covid.survey_question sq ON sq.ssq_id = f.ssq_id JOIN covid.survey s ON s.survey_id = sq.survey_id JOIN covid.question q ON sq.question_id = q.question_id JOIN covid.option o ON f.option_id = o.option_id WHERE u.user_id = #{user.userId} AND u.is_active = 1 AND sq.survey_id = #{surveyQuestion.survey.surveyId} AND s.is_active = 1

SELECT distinct(f.user_id), sq.survey_id, o.risk FROM covid.feedback f JOIN covid.USER u ON u.user_id = f.user_id JOIN covid.survey_question sq ON sq.ssq_id = f.ssq_id JOIN covid.survey s ON s.survey_id = sq.survey_id JOIN covid.question q ON sq.question_id = q.question_id JOIN covid.option o ON f.option_id = o.option_id WHERE u.is_active = 1 AND sq.survey_id = #{surveyId} AND s.is_active = 1
AND u.mgr_id = #{userId}
